channel.title: Mill City Hall: Minneapolis politics, slightly ground down
channel.description: A Minneapolis politics podcast hosted by four-term city council member Cam Gordon and longtime activist Jesse Mortenson.
channel.itunes:author: Cam Gordon and Jesse Mortenson

item.title: Jacob Frey, the Trust in Government Guy? Reviewing the State of the City Address
item.description: In May, Jacob Frey gave the official campaign speech for the city... no wait, we mean State of the City speech. Cam and Jesse share highlights and react to a speech that made some strange omissions.
